title: Linux reboot Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux reboot command and learn how to reboot your system immediately or schedule a reboot at a specific time. Gain practical knowledge for system monitoring and management.

meta.title: Linux reboot Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux reboot command and learn how to reboot your system immediately or schedule a reboot at a specific time. Gain practical knowledge for system monitoring and management.

verify.name: Verify the reboot command
verify.hint: Ensure that you have executed the `reboot` command in the terminal and that you are running on a Linux system.

verify.name: Verify the system reboot
verify.hint: Ensure that the system has successfully rebooted and you are able to log back in.

steps.title: Schedule a Reboot at a Specific Time

verify.name: Verify the scheduled reboot
verify.hint: Ensure that you have executed the `shutdown -r` command to schedule a reboot, and the `shutdown -c` command to cancel the scheduled reboot.
